author: chunqingchen
body:
- [x] Resolves issue #1357 .
- [x] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.

The two places that needs to be updated are not yet available in Unix Powershell. Thus no test case can be added this time.

I tried to make update upon my old branches but could not figure out how to fix the sync up issue at the moment. Thus I decide to start from clean branch and continue to learn more about git hub stuff on the go.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @chunqingchen your author email is still "johndoe@example.com". You _must_ fix this per Microsoft policy.

comments.author: chunqingchen
comments.body: @andschwa i just updated the author info

title: Update the job cache location on non-windows platforms
